data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Holguín, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Holguín, Cuba
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, move the 117,572 believers in the state of Holguín to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 117,572 believers in the state of Holguín to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Holguín
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cacocum
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cacocum, Holguín, Cuba.
Father, convict the 117,572 believers in Holguín to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Holguín. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Holguín.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Holguín
location.cities_list: Holguín, Moa, Banes, San Germán, Cacocum
location.cities_list_w_pop: Holguín (319,102), Moa (92,852), Banes (53,104), San Germán (43,892), Cacocum (42,623)
